a.h1: West Bridgewater Public Schools Home of the Wildcats

li.a: ORDER THE 2020 YEARBOOK OR PLACE AN AD!

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Food Services will be offering Free Grab and Go Breakfasts and Lunches for each child Mondays, Wednesdays & Fridays from 9:30 - 11:30. Visit https://www.wbridgewaterschools.org/article/221835?org=district-office for more information.
Notice: All School and Town School Properties are closed until further notice. Please visit https://www.wbridgewaterschools.org/article/221842?org=district-office for more info

div.h3: West Bridgewater Public Schools , 27 days ago
div.p: Attention all WB school families. On Tuesday 3/24 we will be distributing groceries to all families in need at the Spring Street School between 10am -12pm. All are welcome but we request that you RSVP to agrinder@wbridgewater.com. For families that cannot make Tuesday's distribution, we will be available on Friday from 8-11 by appointment only.

div.h3: West Bridgewater Public Schools , 29 days ago
div.p:
Attention all #wbwildcats here's the latest Superintendent's Spotlight with a message from our administrators regarding our school closure.
https://youtu.be/p4X9UFWb0j8
